name: sticker
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small piece of paper or plastic with a picture or writing on one side and glue or another similar substance on the other side, so that it will fasten to a surface: a bumper/window sticker Sophie's notebook is covered with stickers. There were two different price stickers on the shoes I wanted to buy.
Peter Dazeley/The Image Bank/GettyImages
a digital image that is used in electronic communication in order to express a particular idea or feeling
Malte Mueller/GettyImages

Add to word list
Add to word list
a small piece of paper with a picture or writing on one side and a sticky substance on the other: Dana collects stickers of cartoon characters.
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small piece of paper or plastic with a picture or writing on one side and glue or a similar substance on the other side, so that it will fix onto a surface: The painting had a sticker on saying "sold". There were two different price stickers on the shoes I wanted to buy.
